main event: A civilian observer sighted a large, bright orange UFO in the Newark, Harbor Hills, Ohio area on December 28, 1965, and tracked it for approximately 3.5 hours.
interesting points: The object appeared both stationary and in motion, moving to the west occasionally., The object was described as 3 to 4 times larger than an airplane landing light., The UFO's color changed from orange to white during the observation., The observer was a 56-year-old operator and manager at Rockwell Standard Corporation., The observation conditions reported excellent visibility with various cloud covers and no precipitation.
sighted object: a large, bright orange object in the sky
witness description: civilian, age 56, operator and manager at Rockwell Standard Corporation
